sentence: It cuts funding from important infrastructure projects and  takes food away from families struggling to survive.
At the same time, as families struggle, Trump has increased his  wealth by billions since taking office, which is a slap in the face to  American families struggling to put food on the table.

Speaker, the American people have felt the same  uncertainty, years of what many viewed as America last policies that  left families struggling, dreams deferred, and our Nation asking  itself: Are we on the rise or decline?

The pain has been all too real for far too  many Americans, including families struggling without paychecks,  seniors on the brink of hunger with food assistance lapsed, airports in  chaos, and communities bracing as programs that they rely on were  stalled or stopped altogether.
